BushTripInjector.ChangeLog:
0.7.3.981 FEATURE: Let ATC decide the starting runway. ==> Runway must be empty in BTI. FEATURE: Select Mode for Worldmap: Aerial, Aerial with Labels, Road FEATURE: Configure your own map tile server, see .config/example.maps.comfig UPDATE: support for deepl.com app V2.3.1 UPDATE: remove compatibility code to v0.5
0.7.4.991 UPDATE: Updated the BTI internal database to sim version 1.15.7. Airports: 36981 -> 37165 (+183), added: 211, changed 244, deleted 28 Runways: 87362 -> 87642 (+279), added: 401, changed 100, deleted 122 Detailed Changelog inside of the package UPDATE: Optimized Logging: increased performance for Release Builds BUGFIX: Another fix for deepl-app BUGFIX: Memory-Leak in Translation and 3D Image Window fixed.
